summary: This bill, the Camp Nelson National Monument Boundary Expansion Act, proposes to expand the Camp Nelson National Monument in Kentucky. It authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to acquire approximately 132 acres of land for inclusion in the monument. Furthermore, it amends Section 2303 of the John D. Dingell, Jr. Conservation, Management, and Recreation Act to reflect the name change from "Camp Nelson Heritage National Monument" to "Camp Nelson National Monument" throughout relevant legal text.
